Volume Collection: Turn flat hair into thick, full 24-hour volume* with a plumping effect inspired by collagen.', '*3-step system of volume shampoo, conditioner, and root lifting spray gel', 'View larger', 'Smooth Collection: Shampoo, Conditioner & Shine Serum', 'Dare to go 72 hour smooth.* Smooth System: Stay smooth all summer. Moroccan Argan Oil in a Pro-V system helps lock out humidity and keeps frizz from forming.', '*Smooth shampoo and conditioner system', 'View larger', 'Daily Moisture Renewal Collection: Shampoo, Conditioner & Silky Moisture Whip', 'Dare to erase the damage of 100 blow-drys.* Daily Moisture Renewal: The Pro-V System Nourishes to help lock in moisture and fight blow-dry damage.', '*Damage to smoothness and shine', 'View larger', 'Color Preserve Shine Collection: Shampoo & Conditioner', 'Dare to fight fade wash after wash. Pantene Color Preserve Shine gives color treated hair a new protective outer layer and leaves hair vibrant.', 'View larger', 'Pro-V Stylers: Your Hair Style Essentials', 'Dare to do the Style, Not the Damage. Pantene Pro-V Stylers: Try Pantene’s complete line of styling products. A full range of Pro-V formulas to smooth, add volume, protect, or hold your hair healthy style all day.']

Review Text: This is my usual conditioner but I've been looking for a bigger bottle that doesn't have the pump top. This fits the bill great.
Review Title: Now this will last me a while

reference_summary:
Pantene Pro-v Ultimate 10 Bb Conditioner With Pump, 28.9 Fluid Ounce
Pantene
["Multitask like you mean it with Pantene Pro-V Ultimate 10 BB Conditioner. BB stands for beauty boosting and this conditioner's formula works overtime to help tame fly-aways, repair roughness, infuse silky softness, add brilliant shine, smooth, control frizz, boost moisture, detangle, make hair manageable, and help keep your strands strong against damage. Help solve your hair problems from dryness to dullness with this 10in1 conditioner for flawlessly healthy hair. Also try it with the shampoo and treatment in the Pantene Pro-V Ultimate 10 Collection."]

profile:
**User Summary:**

This user has a significant preference for hair care products that provide multitasking benefits, particularly those designed to address specific hair issues like dryness, frizz control, and manageability. Their recent purchase and review of a conditioner not only reinforces their loyalty to effective brands but also highlights their desire for convenience and practicality—favoring larger sizes without complex dispensing mechanisms. The user continues to express a clear appreciation for quality and performance, as indicated by their perfect rating for the product they regularly use.

Key trends in their behavior showcase a strong inclination towards established and reputable brands known for delivering results, emphasizing their focus on overall hair health. They show a particular interest in products formulated for dry hair, reflecting a commitment to moisture and repair. The user values solutions that enhance softness, shine, and manageability while streamlining their hair care routine.

Overall, this user seeks high-performing, effective hair care solutions that simplify their routine, enhance hair texture, and provide lasting benefits—all in a hassle-free format.
